response.overview: Aiden could really use a massage, but covid has closed everything, except Kinky Spa! She gives them a call for an appointment. The masseur’s hands feel so good that when he spills some oil in between her pink pussy lips... she lets him rub it in!! Brooke Banner gets a call from her favorite spa offering massages, she thought they closed because of covid. Nervous they might not be providing intimate service , as her handsome masseur starts to touch her incredible body all over she realizes she was wrong. Jennifer White’s company is going digital because of the pandemic and cutting pay 50%. Her employee says he's going back to giving massages. She hires him for a home massage and  she tells him she wants the "full body" treatment he's done in the past. Texas Patti’s college classes are shut down for the next few weeks for covid. Her student is bummed, but he can make extra money giving massages. Patti agrees to hire her student, and asks if he can give her a "full service" massage!
response.title: MILF Massage Therapy 2
